name: Sushiswap_ZapIn_General_V3
description: SushiSwap liquidity zaps based on awesomeness from zapper.fi (0xcff6eF0B9916682B37D80c19cFF8949bc1886bC2).

functionDecorators.name: ZapIn
functionDecorators.description: This function is used to invest in given SushiSwap pair through ETH/ERC20 Tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _FromTokenContractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC20 token used for investment (address(0x00) if ether).

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of fromToken to invest.

parameterDecorators.name: _minPoolTokens
parameterDecorators.description: Reverts if less tokens received than this.

parameterDecorators.name: _swapTarget
parameterDecorators.description: Excecution target for the first swap.

parameterDecorators.name: transferResidual
parameterDecorators.description: Set false to save gas by donating the residual remaining after a Zap.
